docs.lead_paragraph: Drugmaker Mylan has offered $205 a share, totaling nearly $30 billion, for fellow drugmaker Perrigo. Here's a look at the companies and products that would be combined under a Mylan-Perrigo deal:

headline.main: Mylan and Perrigo: About the Companies
headline.print_headline: Mylan and Perrigo: About the Companies
